pr_title: Add short names for launcher (allowing to pass arguments)

timeline.message:
Add short names for launcher (allowing to pass arguments)
Fix #243

timeline.bodyText: Why my app? Can we use any name? Maybe we could replace the name we already have in ProjectConfiguration?
timeline.author: jperedadnr

replies.bodyText: a follow-up issue will allow to pass JVM parameters, including appname. But we first need to get all platforms on the same level (being able to pass a *args[])
replies.author: johanvos

replies.bodyText: The reason for not doing it here is that it is not trivial to pass a value from a pom.xml into a c file that needs to be compiled at build time.
replies.author: johanvos

timeline.bodyText: The actual invocation of the method at line 37 should be changed to run_main.
timeline.author: tiainen
